item.title: Combining Slurm and GNU parallel
item.description: Last week, I attended a “Midi confÃ©rence” (basically a one hour training session during lunch time) offered by Compute Canada dealing with Slurm, GNU Parallel and how to combine them. This was a very useful and timely presentation for me (ðŸ‡«ðŸ‡· slides available online ðŸ”—) as I’ve just got started with Slurm (see my previous notes on the topic) and was eager to learn more. Earlier today, I found an opportunity to put in practice what I’ve learned last week.
